attributes.action: Make it a criminal offence to take freshwater fish for food at any time.
attributes.additional_details: I have personally seen angler's killing and taking course fish to eat so it's about time the regulations were changed to prevent this. The UK Angler's want all course fishing to be catch and release
attributes.background: I want the government to stop the the killing of our freshwater fish for the table by anyone,as the rivers and Lake in the UK can not support this. If nothing is done we will lose what fishing we have.
